com.microsoft.azure.storage.core

Class StorageOperation<C,P,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.core.StorageOperation<C,P,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The service client type
    P - The type of the parent object, i.e. CloudBlobContainer for downloadAttributes etc.
    R - The type of the expected result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SegmentedStorageOperation

    public abstract class StorageOperation<C,P,R>
extends java.lang.Object
    RESERVED FOR INTERNAL USE. A base class which encapsulate the execution of a given storage operation.

      • execute

        public abstract R execute(C client,
        P parentObject,
        OperationContext opContext)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the operation.
        Parameters:
        client - a reference to the service client associated with the object being operated against
        parentObject - a reference to the parent object of the operation, (i.e. CloudBlobContainer for Create)
        opContext - an object used to track the execution of the operation
        Returns:
        the result from the operation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an error which occurred during execution
